description:
### Context

Vulnerable Children in Developing Countries: special considerations

https://doi.org/10.1787/10e8a12c-en
https://www.oecd-ilibrary.org/social-issues-migration-health/changing-the-odds-for-vulnerable-children_10e8a12c-en

### Content

"This chapter describes the common challenges facing vulnerable children in developing countries, taking a life-cycle approach. It examines selected dimensions of well-being, including educational attainment, health and child protection measures. Child outcomes can vary based on household income, parents’ education, gender, ethnicity and place of residence."

https://www.oecd-ilibrary.org/social-issues-migration-health/changing-the-odds-for-vulnerable-children_10e8a12c-en

### Inspiration

Vulnerable Children in Developing Countries during the Covid-19 Pandemic
title: Attendance in early Childhood Education
